query:
SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.email,
       (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(g.id, ':', u.name) SEPARATOR ', ')
        FROM gestor_lojas gl
        JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
        JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
        WHERE gl.lojaId = l.id) as gestores_associados
FROM lojas l
WHERE l.nome LIKE '%castanheira%' OR l.nome LIKE '%pesados%' OR l.nome LIKE '%Viseu%'
ORDER BY l.nome

       (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(g.id, ':', u.name) SEPARATOR ', ')
        FROM gestor_lojas gl
        JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
        JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
        WHERE gl.lojaId = l.id) as gestores_associados
FROM lojas l
WHERE l.nome LIKE '%castanheira%' OR l.nome LIKE '%pesados%' OR l.nome LIKE '%Viseu%'
ORDER BY l.nome
